title: (Squill) = (Kayle) ??
body: I am just confused that what happened there... because I've never known any Squill in-game.

replies.body: That's the name that comes up when Lulu poly morphs a champion.
Yup! That's the name of the Polymorph critter. If you're playing against a Bittersweet Lulu, you'll be called Cupcake. :D
Woah, that's something new to me even though I've spent quite a lot of time on LOL. Thanks!! :D
